'''''Space Force Cadet''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete three puzzles involving [[Potential Energy Orb]]s near the southeast waypoint of the [[Morte Region]]. A [[Precious Chest]] is also rewarded.

==Gameplay Notes==
* The puzzles must be started by entering one of two specific [[Phase Gate]]s near the southeast [[Teleport Waypoint]] of the Morte Region. One is next to a [[Construction Specialist Mek]] on the ground a bit north of the Teleport Waypoint, while the other is on the floating rubble immediately west of the Teleport Waypoint.
